content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: AH, HELLO LITTLE ONE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: WELCOME.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: I WAS JUST THINKING HOW MUCH I DESIRED COMPANY.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THIS SPACE FEELS...COLD TODAY, SOMEHOW.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: COLDER AT LEAST THAN IT DID BEFORE.

content.name: {player}
content.dialogue: Sorry.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: NONSENSE, LITTLE ONE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IT IS NOT YOUR DOING.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IF ANYTHING, I AM AFRAID IT IS IN MY NATURE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: A SIDE-EFFECT OF MY ETERNITY.

content.name: {player}
content.dialogue: ...What do you mean?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: WHAT DO YOU KNOW OF ENTROPY, LITTLE ONE?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: OF IT'S PLACE IN THIS VASTNESS WE INHABIT?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: HAHA.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THAT IS ALRIGHT. I CAN EXPLAIN.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: ENTROPY IS THE PATHWAY BY WHICH ENERGY MOVES, LITTLE ONE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IT IS THE HEARTBEAT OF THE COSMOS.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IN THE SAME WAY YOU ARE DESIGNED TO STRIVE FOR LIFE

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THE INFINITY STRIVES FOR CHAOS, FOR DISORDER.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: ENTROPY IS THE METHOD OF THIS STRIVING.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: BUT ENERGY CANNOT LAST FOREVER.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: ALL THINGS MUST SETTLE, GIVEN TIME.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: AND WHEN THEY ARE SETTLED, THERE WILL BE NO MORE ENTROPY.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: AND THE UNIVERSE WILL DIE A FROZEN DEATH.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: DO YOU UNDERSTAND?

content.name: {player}
content.dialogue: I...I think so.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IT IS, I FEAR, THE NATURE OF ETERNAL THINGS TO STAGNATE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: WE ARE UNLIKE YOU. OUR LIVES OUTSTRETCH OUR DRIVING IMPULSES.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: CAN WE ANIMATE OURSELVES FOREVER? I DO NOT KNOW.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: AND THAT...FRIGHTENS ME.

options.text: You need to find someone who can animate you.
You need to let go of your fear.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: YOU ARE VERY WISE, LITTLE ONE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: VERY WISE INDEED.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: AND, I BELIEVE, CORRECT IN YOUR ASSESSMENT.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THAT IS WHAT I AM STRIVING FOR, I THINK.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: TO FIND THE PERSON WHO WILL STAY BY ME FOR ALL TIME.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: WHO WILL LEND ME THEIR ENERGY WHEN MINE FAILS.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: WHO WILL GIVE ME IMPULSE WHEN I AM WITHOUT.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IT IS A BEAUTIFUL THOUGHT, IS IT NOT?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THAT WE MAY EACH FIND SOMEONE WHO BRIGHTENS ALL OUR DAYS.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: EVEN AS THEY STRETCH BEYOND MORTAL COMPREHENSION.

content.name: {player}
content.dialogue: Yeah.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: INDEED.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THANK YOU FOR LISTENING TO ME, LITTLE ONE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IT IS A RARE GIFT, TO BE HEARD.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: I DO NOT TAKE IT LIGHTLY.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: WERE IT ONLY THAT EASY, LITTLE ONE?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: I AM NOT A BEING EASILY CHANGED.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: FEAR, ONCE ROOTED IN ME, CANNOT BE EASILY TORN AWAY

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: MY PEOPLE WERE MADE TO ENDURE, YOU SEE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: TO RIDE THE LONG RIVER OF TIME.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: WE MUST NOT EASILY BREAK APART, IF WE WANT TO SURVIVE THAT.

content.name: {player}
content.dialogue: Okay.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: NONETHELESS, I APPRECIATE YOUR COUNSEL.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: YOU HAVE A PERSPECTIVE I LACK, LITTLE ONE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THAT'S NOTHING TO BE ASHAMED OF.
